answers.answer: It's your age.  Quite possibly the bleeding is due to premenopause/menopause.  But the ankle swelling?I don't understand why they're not concerned about that.  Do you have hypertension and/or diabetes?

question: I have been bleeding every day for two months.  Sometimes heavy sometimes very light.  I am 44.  My ankles are also swelling.  I am over weight.  I have all my blood work done an a pap smear which came back good.  Doctor doesnt seem to be to concern and I am scheduled for an ultrasound.  What is going on and why arent they concern?  I am miserable.
title: vaginal bleeding
